overview:
Andrew M. Healy is National Sales Manager for Earth Advantage and is responsible for its line of service offerings, including the popular Energy Performance Score (EPS) Auditor software platform that helps auditors generate fast and accurate audits.

Andy has a wide range of experience, most recently serving as the Vice President of Sales at a SaaS company, BecauseIRun. Previously he has worked for McKinstry, where he served as Account Manager, qualifying and closing contractual technical service agreements and energy efficiency projects. Prior to McKinstry, he was Branch Manager at Ferguson Enterprises, where he led sales efforts in the Willamette Valley in the industrial wholesale distribution market.

He received an MBA from Portland State University and a Bachelor of Science in Economics from Oregon State University.
